name: The Walking Dead: Season Two Episode 4 - Amid the Ruins
name_original: The Walking Dead: Season Two Episode 4 - Amid the Ruins
description:
The Walking Dead: Season Two Episode 4 - Amid the Ruins is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It came out on 22-07-2014. Telltale Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play The Walking Dead: Season Two Episode 4 - Amid the Ruins on PC and PlayStation 3.
